      This function manages the calls of the CommandParser CommandInterpreter for parsing a zip file, and executing the commands specified.
      void DataController.printAllMention(java.lang.String inChannel, boolean weight)
      Prints all the mention of a specified channel, if inChannel is null the function prints all the mention of the workspace, with the boolean weight the function can show the numbers of mention.
      void DataController.printMentionsFromUser(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention from a specified user in a specified channel.
      void DataController.printMentionsFromUserWeigthed(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention from a specified user in a specified channel with the number of mention (weight).
      void DataController.printMentionsToUser(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention to a specified user in a specified channel.
      void DataController.printMentionsToUserWeigthed(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention to a specified user in a specified channel with the number of mention(weight).
